title: Black Dragonborn
entryLore: Descended from the cruel and predatory black dragons of the swamps, these dragonborn carry the power of acid in their breath. They often possess a grim determination and a resilience refined by the harsh environments their ancestors call home.

traits.name: Acid Breath
traits.description: When you use your [[breath_weapon|Breath Weapon]], it deals [[acid_damage|Acid damage]]. You choose whether the breath manifests as a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line.
